inclusion.criterion: not been suffering from serious chronic illness
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: child stool test must be positive for STH
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: he/she had not been taken any antehelminthic drug in the previous six months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: age of the child less than 2 years old and more than 5 years old
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: his/her stool test negative for any intestinal helminth
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man presenting with shortness of breath. He has COPD and smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
